citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am. on
27-Sep-16.
Inspector called licensee and left a message. Licensee returned phone call and stated was unable to return for an
inspection due to vehicle repairs.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am. on
27-Sep-16.
Inspector called licensee and left a message. Licensee returned phone call and stated was unable to return for an
inspection due to vehicle repairs.
